Yarnee Product Page

Home/Portfolio/Yarnee

Released :February 2014

Role :Design

Client :Yarnee

Tools:Sketch

Link :iTunes

Yarnee

In 2014, i began working with Yarnee during development on their new social curation app. My first task was to design the First Time User Experience for the app, introducing the primary features of the app.

Further to this, i worked on UX improvements and delivered design proposals for the marketing product page and a web implementation of the Yarnee view.

Discovery

Yarnee is a mobile app that lets you create shareable collections of your favourite content.

The Challenge - Promote the newly launched Yarnee app.

The Solution - Design a marketing product page promoting the key features of the Yarnee app.

Inspiration

I chose to follow guidelines set by Apple product pages, with a single page site, clear bold type, attractive device images and an informative feature overview promoting the key elements of the Yarnee app.

Sketching

I chose to work within a simple 12-column grid, maintaining a standard structure for ease of development and clarity in delivering the key message.

Breaking the page down into discreet sections, i focused first on the featurette section, as this closely linked to the FTUE work i had previously delivered. Following this i added in-app device images to promote actual use cases.

Accompanying text was kept light and approachable, in line with the feeling of the app.

Code

I built out the wireframes in Sketch to incorporate device images and descriptive text. Using Xcode simulator to grab in-app images, i utilized the Sketch plugin 'Magic Mirror' to place these into devices.

I linked the Sketch design to the Zeplin application for simple guideline generation and hand over to the developement team.

Yarnee

Quick and Easy Collections of Your Favourite Content

Yarnee

The social curation app for iPhone. For moments that belong together.
